sentences.sContent: The plug-in names followed by an asterisk are those that were loaded during startup.
sentences.sContent_eng: The plug-in names followed by an asterisk are those that were loaded during startup.
sentences.sCn: 后面跟有一个星号的插件名是那些在启动的时候就加载的插件。

sentences.sContent: The first part is the period asterisk characters, .*, which here means anything before any number of spaces and the group (.*?).
sentences.sContent_eng: The first part is the period asterisk characters, .*, which here means anything before any number of spaces and the group (.*?).
sentences.sCn: 第一部分是点号和星号字符 .* ，它们在这里表示 任意数量的空格和 (.*?) 组之前的任何字符 。

sentences.sContent: It might be handy to remember that the namestring can contain wildcard characters (asterisk is the only supported character but you can use several in the namestring.
sentences.sContent_eng: It might be handy to remember that the namestring can contain wildcard characters (asterisk is the only supported character but you can use several in the namestring.
sentences.sCn: 记住名称字符串可以包含通配符会很方便（虽然星号是惟一支持的字符，但是可以在名称字符串中使用多个。

trans.tranOther: a mark like a star (*), used especially to show something interesting or important
